snippet: Soccer players have been shown to have superior executive functions, the brain processes responsible for planning and abstract thinking.
abstract: Dr Predrag Petrovic study in journal PLoS One finds that soccer players have superior executive functions, brain processes responsible for planning and abstract thinking; reports that the trend is more pronounced in elite players.
lead_paragraph: Soccer players have been shown to have superior executive functions, the brain processes responsible for planning and abstract thinking.

headline.print_headline: More Brainpower Seen In Soccer’s Top Scorers
headline.seo: Top Soccer Players Are Seen to Have Superior Brain Function
headline.main: More Brainpower Seen in Soccer’s Top Scorers
